Text: hello, don't want to jump to conclusions but after an attempt at using this my dark souls would no longer open. also when i removed the file dark souls simply freezes on start up... i cant stress how stressful this is considering the painstaking progress iv made soloing this game. if any one could tell me where the auto save files are located that would be greatly appreciated

i would also suggest no one use this fix im now under the impression that this is some sort of virus. not only can i not delete the file but since use every aspect of pc performance has slowed to a crawl.

Of course will be slow this increase resolution of textures and for this will be required more memory, this is no virus, see this new http://lik.cl/?http://www.neogaf.com/forum/showthread.php?t=488240 if you have a question open the readme file and see the link inside.
You can edit the ini file (whit notepad or other editor) to your preference.

The fix it works just fine it fices the DoF bug and is stable if you have problems with this torrent i suggest to d/l it from here 

http://blog.metaclassofnil.com/

PS This doenst work on a optimus system.
It's legit and you can read more about it here -> http://www.neogaf.com/forum/showthread.php?t=488240

Don't forget to disable Blur an Antialiasing on game options (not in ini file).

""IMPORTANT: turn OFF the in-game AA/blur option""
